DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to describe the natural history of patients with alpha-1 antitrypsin associated emphysema and to figure out associated prognostic factors.
DOC.brief_title: Management of Patients With Alpha-1 Antitrypsin Deficiency Associated Emphysema
DOC.detailed_description: All patients who suffer from this disease are followed every 6 months during a 5 years period. FEV1 decline is the primary endpoint. Quality of life assessed using the Saint George's Respiratory Questionary is recorded too.
DOC.criteria: Serum alpha one antitrypsin < 0.8 g/l Emphysema diagnosed by CT scan Adult Obstructive disorder Liver or lung transplantation
